name: car_rental_agent
description: An agent specialized in providing car rental services and vehicle bookings. Offers car search, rental booking, and cancellation services.

skills.name: Car Rental Search
skills.description: Search for available rental cars based on location, dates, and vehicle preferences

skills.name: Car Rental Booking
skills.description: Book rental cars and manage vehicle reservations

skills.name: Booking Cancellation
skills.description: Cancel existing car rental bookings and process refunds
